mdRecord.dcterms:title: The reports of Richard Brownlow and John Goldesborough, Esquires: the first and second part
Reports of divers choice cases in law
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Brownlow, Richard, 1553-1638
England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
Goldesborough, John, 1568-1618
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Part 1 has special t.p.: Reports of divers choice cases in law taken by ... Richard Brownlow and John Goldesborough; the first part ... 3d ed. ... London, H. Twyford and S. Heyrick, 1675.
Part 2 has special t.p.: Reports of divers famous cases in law ... collected by Richard Brownlow ... The second part ... 2d ed. ... London, H. Twyford, 1675.
Includes permit for reprinting of both parts.
Library copy lacks general t.p. and special t.p. for 1st part.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
